doc:
Omar Epps https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Omar_Epps 0 Omar Hashim Epps (born July 20, 1973) is an American actor, rapper, songwriter and record producer. His film roles include Juice, Higher Learning, The Wood, In Too Deep and Love and Basketball. His television work includes the role of Dr. Dennis Gant on the medical drama series ER, J. Martin Bellamy in Resurrection and Dr. Eric Foreman on the Fox medical drama series House from 2004 to 2012. Omar_Hashim_Epps ( born July_20_,_1973 ) is an_American_actor , rapper_,_songwriter_and_record_producer . His_film_roles include Juice , Higher_Learning , The_Wood , In_Too_Deep and Love_and_Basketball . His_television_work includes the_role of Dr._Dennis_Gant on the_medical_drama_series_ER , J._Martin_Bellamy in Resurrection and Dr._Eric_Foreman on the_Fox_medical_drama_series_House from 2004 to 2012 .
